item.name: Toorak Winery
item.description: A traditional, long-established Riverina producer with a strong Italian-based clientele around Australia. Production has increased significantly, utilising substantial estate plantings and grapes purchased from other growers in the Riverina and elsewhere. Wines are released under the Toorak Estate, Willandra Estate and Amesbury Estate labels. While, in absolute terms, the quality is not great, the low-priced wines in fact over-deliver in many instances. Exports to the US, Norway, Russia, Nigeria, India, Singapore and China.
